crossdevice_def:
Ubiquitous Analytics.

"The concept of harnessing multiple networked devices for deep data analytics anywhere and anytime is called ubiquitious analytics (ubilytics) [12], and draws upon a significant body of existing work that supports synchronous and colocated collaboration using distributed user interfaces [30], distributed visualization [18], and post-WIMP interaction models [16]."
